languages.text: {n}Каллигос придвигается ближе и скалится в недоброй улыбке.{/n} "Ты думал{mf||а}, что я не узнаю про твою маленькую аферу с Касбалликой? Решу, что твои придворные умники сами додумались до того, как оснастить газовые фактории? Напрасно, {name}. Но я не в обиде. Признаться, я даже... восхищен".

{n}He leans closer and gives you an ominous smile.{/n} "Did you think I wouldn't learn about your little ploy with the Kasballica? Did you think I would assume that one of your clever subjects just happened to figure out how to set up gas factoriums? Well, you were mistaken, {name}. But I am not offended. I must admit, I'm actually a little... awestruck."
languages.original_text: {n}Каллигос придвигается ближе и скалится в недоброй улыбке.{/n} "Ты думал{mf||а}, что я не узнаю про твою маленькую аферу с Касбалликой? Решу, что твои придворные умники сами додумались до того, как оснастить газовые фактории? Напрасно, {name}. Но я не в обиде. Признаться, я даже... восхищен".

traits.locale_text: {n}He leans closer and gives you an ominous smile.{/n} "Did you think I wouldn't learn about your little ploy with the Kasballica? Did you think I would assume that one of your clever subjects just happened to figure out how to set up gas factoriums? Well, you were mistaken, {name}. But I am not offended. I must say, I'm even... fascinated."

Did you think I would assume that one of your clever subjects just happened to figure out how to set up gas factoriums? Well, you were mistaken, {name}. But I am not offended. I must say, I'm even... fascinated."

I must admit, I'm actually a little... awestruck."

{n}He leans closer and gives you an ominous smile.{/n} "Did you think I wouldn't learn about your little ploy with the Kasballica? Did you think I would assume that one of your clever subjects just happened to figure out how to set up gas factoriums? Well, you were mistaken, {name}. But I am not offended. I must admit, I'm actually a little... awestruck."

{n}He leans closer and gives you an ominous smile.{/n} "Did you think I wouldn't learn about your little ploy with the Kasballica? Did you think I would assume that one of your clever subjects just happened to figure out how to set up gas factoriums? Well, you were mistaken, {name}. But I am not offended. I must admit, I'm actually a little... awestruck."

languages.text: {n}Il se rapproche et vous adresse un sourire sinistre.{/n} « Vous pensiez que je ne découvrirais pas vos petites manigances avec la Kasballica ? Que je penserais que l'un de vos brillants sujets avait par son seul génie trouvé un moyen d'installer des factoriums gaziers ? Eh bien, vous vous trompiez, {name}. Mais je ne vous en veux pas pour autant, au contraire. À vrai dire, j'en viendrais presque à vous... admirer. »
languages.original_text: {n}He leans closer and gives you an ominous smile.{/n} "Did you think I wouldn't learn about your little ploy with the Kasballica? Did you think I would assume that one of your clever subjects just happened to figure out how to set up gas factoriums? Well, you were mistaken, {name}. But I am not offended. I must admit, I'm actually a little... awestruck."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il se rapproche et vous adresse un sourire sinistre.{/n} « Vous pensiez que je ne découvrirais pas vos petites manigances avec la Kasballica ? Que je penserais que l'un de vos brillants sujets avait par son seul génie trouvé un moyen d'installer des factoriums gaziers ? Eh bien, vous vous trompiez, {name}. Mais je ne vous en veux pas pour autant, au contraire. À vrai dire, j'en viendrais presque à vous... admirer. »

languages.text: {n}Se inclina hacia ti y te muestra una sonrisa siniestra.{/n} «¿Creía que no descubriría su pequeña treta con la Kasballica? ¿Se pensaba que daría por hecho que uno de sus astutos súbditos hallaría por sí solo las técnicas para establecer factoriums de gas? Pues se equivocaba, {name}. No estoy ofendido, pero sí un poco... perplejo».
languages.original_text: {n}He leans closer and gives you an ominous smile.{/n} "Did you think I wouldn't learn about your little ploy with the Kasballica? Did you think I would assume that one of your clever subjects just happened to figure out how to set up gas factoriums? Well, you were mistaken, {name}. But I am not offended. I must admit, I'm actually a little... awestruck."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se inclina hacia ti y te muestra una sonrisa siniestra.{/n} «¿Creía que no descubriría su pequeña treta con la Kasballica? ¿Se pensaba que daría por hecho que uno de sus astutos súbditos hallaría por sí solo las técnicas para establecer factoriums de gas? Pues se equivocaba, {name}. No estoy ofendido, pero sí un poco... perplejo».

languages.text: {n}彼はあなたに近づき、不吉な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「カスバリカを利用したお前の策略のことを、俺が知らないとでも思ったのか？お前の賢しい臣下のひとりが、たまたまガス・ファクトリウムの設置方法を導き出しただけだと考えるとでも思っていたのか？いや、それは間違いだ、{name}よ。だが、責めるつもりはない。正直に言えば…少しばかり驚かされたよ」
languages.original_text: {n}He leans closer and gives you an ominous smile.{/n} "Did you think I wouldn't learn about your little ploy with the Kasballica? Did you think I would assume that one of your clever subjects just happened to figure out how to set up gas factoriums? Well, you were mistaken, {name}. But I am not offended. I must admit, I'm actually a little... awestruck."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼はあなたに近づき、不吉な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「カスバリカを利用したお前の策略のことを、俺が知らないとでも思ったのか？お前の賢しい臣下のひとりが、たまたまガス・ファクトリウムの設置方法を導き出しただけだと考えるとでも思っていたのか？いや、それは間違いだ、{name}よ。だが、責めるつもりはない。正直に言えば…少しばかり驚かされたよ」

languages.text: {n}他朝你靠得更近了，对你露出了充满不祥意味的微笑。{/n}“你以为我不知道你和卡斯巴利卡之间那些小小的往来吗？莫非你觉得，我会以为那座毒气工厂的建造方案是你某个聪明的研究员碰巧想出来的吗？要是这样，那你可错了，{name}。不过，我并没有感到被冒犯。我得承认，我其实有点……心怀敬畏。”
languages.original_text: {n}He leans closer and gives you an ominous smile.{/n} "Did you think I wouldn't learn about your little ploy with the Kasballica? Did you think I would assume that one of your clever subjects just happened to figure out how to set up gas factoriums? Well, you were mistaken, {name}. But I am not offended. I must admit, I'm actually a little... awestruck."

traits.locale_text: {n}他朝你靠得更近了，对你露出了充满不祥意味的微笑。{/n}“你以为我不知道你和卡斯巴利卡之间那些小小的往来吗？莫非你觉得，我会以为那座毒气工厂的建造方案是你某个聪明的研究员碰巧想出来的吗？要是这样，那你可错了，{name}。不过，我并没有感到被冒犯。我得承认，我其实有点……心怀敬畏。”

languages.text: {n}Er lehnt sich zu dir und schenkt dir ein unheilvolles Lächeln.{/n} "Dachtet Ihr, ich würde nichts von Eurem kleinen Trick mit der Kasballica erfahren? Dachtet Ihr, ich würde annehmen, dass einer Eurer tüchtigen Untertanen rein zufällig herausgefunden hat, wie man Gasfactorien erzeugt? Tja, falsch gedacht, {name}. Aber ich bin deshalb nicht beleidigt. Ich gebe zu, ich bin sogar ein wenig ... ehrfürchtig."
languages.original_text: {n}He leans closer and gives you an ominous smile.{/n} "Did you think I wouldn't learn about your little ploy with the Kasballica? Did you think I would assume that one of your clever subjects just happened to figure out how to set up gas factoriums? Well, you were mistaken, {name}. But I am not offended. I must admit, I'm actually a little... awestruck."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er lehnt sich zu dir und schenkt dir ein unheilvolles Lächeln.{/n} "Dachtet Ihr, ich würde nichts von Eurem kleinen Trick mit der Kasballica erfahren? Dachtet Ihr, ich würde annehmen, dass einer Eurer tüchtigen Untertanen rein zufällig herausgefunden hat, wie man Gasfactorien erzeugt? Tja, falsch gedacht, {name}. Aber ich bin deshalb nicht beleidigt. Ich gebe zu, ich bin sogar ein wenig ... ehrfürchtig."

languages.text: {n}Yanına doğru eğiliyor ve uğursuzca sana gülümsüyor.{/n} "Kasballica'yla ilgili minik dümenini öğrenemeyeceğimi mi sandın? Kafası çalışan bir tebaanın durup dururken gaz fabrikalarının nasıl kurulduğunu keşfettiğini varsayacağımı mı düşündün? Öyleyse yanıldın {name}. Ama dert etmiyorum. Hatta itiraf etmem gerekiyor ki biraz... Hayran bile kaldım."
languages.original_text: {n}He leans closer and gives you an ominous smile.{/n} "Did you think I wouldn't learn about your little ploy with the Kasballica? Did you think I would assume that one of your clever subjects just happened to figure out how to set up gas factoriums? Well, you were mistaken, {name}. But I am not offended. I must admit, I'm actually a little... awestruck."
